input.label: Username
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup SPUser | search IsDomainGroup="False" | stats count by src_user | eval vLoginName=replace(src_user,"\\\\","\\\\") | sort src_user

table.title: Basic Information
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPUser | search src_user="$username$" | dedup Sid | table LoginName, DisplayName, Sid | transpose | append [search eventtype=mssharepoint-iis src_user="$username$"|stats latest(_time) as lastLoginTime by src_user|eval "row 1"=strftime(lastLoginTime,"%c") | eval column="Last Login Time" | table column,"row 1"]

table.title: Site Permissions
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPUser | search src_user="$username$" | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title | eval Title=if(isnull(Title),WebId,Title) | table Title, IsSiteAdmin, IsSiteAuditor

chart.title: Access History
chart.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis src_user="$username$" sc_status=200 | eval pages=1 | timechart per_minute(pages) as "Pages/Min"

table.title: Document Access History
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit src_user="$username$" ItemType=1 | `IgnoreExtensions` | lookup SPAuditEventType Event OUTPUT EventType | dedup consecutive=t DocLocation,EventType | table _time,EventType,DocLocation
